latestInspection.result: Inspection Result Initial Annual Inspection - Passed inspection with no violations

violations.Violation Summary: At time of inspection it was determined that child care service allows staff to perform their duties that are not healthy or are incapable of carrying out their duties Staff medical clearances are not maintained by child care service
violations.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

violations.Violation Summary: Child care service teaching staff in an infant/toddler program do not meet staff qualification requirements
Child care service failed to provide or maintain record of staff immunizations
Milk observed stored at a temperature above 41 deg F at time of inspection Milk observed stored in child care service beyond the expiration date
violations.Category: Violations requiring immediate correction Public Health Hazards

violations.Violation Summary: Infant toddler staff allows infants to sleep in other than safe sleep environment fail to move infant to safe sleep environment when required more than one infant observed sleeping in a single crib or bassinet
violations.Category: Violations requiring immediate correction Public Health Hazards

violations.Violation Summary: Milk observed stored at a temperature above 41 deg F at time of inspection Milk observed stored in child care service beyond the expiration date
